parameters.description: The message sink to report results back to.

children.summary: Starts the process of finding tests in an assembly. Typically only used by runners which discover tests and present them into a UI for the user to interactively choose for selective run (via ). For runners which simply wish to discover and immediately run tests, they should instead use , which permits the same filtering logic as this method.

parameters.description: The message sink to report results back to.
The settings used during discovery and execution.

children.summary: Starts the process of finding and running tests in an assembly. Typically only used by runner which do not present test discovery UIs to users that allow them to run selected tests (those should instead use and as separate operations).

specName.value: Xunit.Runner.v3
Xunit.Runner.v3

summary: This class is used to do discovery and execution of xUnit.net v3 tests. Runner authors are strongly encouraged to use instead of using this class directly.

content.value: public class Xunit3 : IFrontController, IFrontControllerDiscoverer, IAsyncDisposable
Public Class Xunit3 Implements IFrontController, IFrontControllerDiscoverer, IAsyncDisposable
